item.description:
In honor of the unofficial beginning of summer and the success of our AIA Convention and Common Boston Weekend '08, we are adding a fun social to the scheduled MeetUp at the Boston Public Library (that is, following Rotch Scholar Ryan Yaden's "Evolving Architecture Around the Globe" lecture at the Boston Public Library this Wednesday, May 28 at 6:00 pm).

For those of you interested, we are going to take a short evening walk to banQ, the new bar/restaurant on Washington Street. Designed by Office dA, banQ is an adaptive reuse of the old Penny Savings Bank building.

When the lecture's over, let's meet by the entrance.
If you don't make the lecture, please feel free to simply join us there around 8!
(Hopefully the group will look designer-architect enough to recognize :)

Enjoy a cash bar and designer-architect discussions galore. banQ's address is 1375 Washington Street (Google map link is here).
item.how_to_find_us: You can check with Michael Murphy at Banq and he will help you find the group.
item.why: Let's go out after the lecture at the library!
item.name: Banq Social
